File Master: Route Information and Fares
Historical transaction data kept: 1 month as backup
Driver ID and Bus number will be used for authentication and to retrieve the relevant Duty Code and Trip Info
For regular login| info regarding staging will be returned to TMS.

For replacement bus login| staging will already be updated with the latest trip info (ie| bus stops that have been passed would already be disabled). Replacement bus login takes place in a different TMS.
For replacement driver login| only current driver ID will be changed.
Single Ticket or Group Ticket (multiple Single Ticket. Eg| if purchase in group of 5| 5 tickets will be printed)
For realtime updates| ticketing info will be sent to the server upon the trigger of next bus stop's arrival.
There are 5 possible scenario when a bus is on its run:
2. Inpection (in the middle of a trip)
There are 2 possible follow ups to Breakdown:
1. bus breakdown - SOP for replacemnet bus will be triggered.
2. hardware breakdown (Printer| Card Reader| GPS| TMS) - the bus will operate in offline mode until the end of the trip.
When Bus breakdowns and cannot continue| Driver will end his trip via End Day process.
1. TMS Breakdown: Driver manually sells tickets until the end of the trip (day?).
2. Printer Breakdown: Driver manually sells tickets until the end of the trip (day?).
3. Card Reader Breakdown: Driver continue without selling ticket by PT Card
3. GPS Breakdown: Driver manually update staging records in TMS.
(* during offline mode| Driver will require necessary items (eg tickets) to operate)
All flows between UI will be filtered by User Access Control to ensure only users with appropriate authority can access certain function and info.
There are 4 different version of Dashboards for different users
:1 Management - Dashboard will show mainly financial information
:1 Executive - Dashboard will show high level info on daily operation
:1 Supervisor - Dashboard will show list of ongoing activities with current status and reminders on jobs need to be done
:1 Workshop - Information regarding Buses' service and maintenance jobs
There are 4 main types of Operation UI
:1 Ticketing Hardwares (TMS| Printer| Card Reader| GPS Device)
:1 Hardware (TMS| Printer| Card Reader| GPS Device) Installation
If the App cannot retrieve the Bus Stop info based on current location from GPS| the user will need to select the required Bus Stop from a list.
User select a destination from a list. The selected destination will be used to retrieve the relevant timeatable from the server.
:2 Ticketing Revenue / Maintenance Cost / Trip Statistics
:2 Trip List and Statistics / Service and Maintenance List and Status
:2 Bus by Status / Drivers by Status / Expiry Reminder

:1 Duty Roster Code Update and Inquire
